statements: DELETE FROM VehicleLocation WHERE vehicle_id = 101 AND timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00';
DELETE FROM VehicleLocation WHERE latitude < 0 OR speed > 100;
DELETE FROM vehicle_locations WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND location_timestamp <= '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM vehicle_movement WHERE start_location = 'New York' AND distance_travelled > 1000;
DELETE FROM VehicleStatus WHERE vehicle_id = 201 AND status = 'Inactive';
DELETE FROM VehicleLocation WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM RouteOptimization WHERE optimize_start < '2022-06-01' AND vehicle_id = 456;
DELETE FROM movements WHERE vehicle_id = 1 AND location_id = 3;
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'OverSpeed' AND alert_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
